2.text: Scrape any congealed or blobbed paint off your clothing with a spoon or knife.
2.vid: /1/12/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 2 Version 6.360p.mp4

4.text: Dab as much off the paint off with a dry paper towel as possible.
4.vid: /1/10/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 4 Version 6.360p.mp4

5.text: Soak the stained area with the isopropyl alcohol.
5.vid: /6/65/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 5 Version 6.360p.mp4

6.vid: /5/59/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 6 Version 6.360p.mp4

7.text: Put the clothing into the washing machine.

9.text: Soak the stained part of the clothing with cold water.
9.vid: /9/96/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 9 Version 6.360p.mp4

10.text: Mix together 1 cup/240ml of ammonia, 1 cup/240ml of white vinegar and a handful of salt.
10.vid: /5/57/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 10 Version 6.360p.mp4

11.text: Drain the water from the soaking clothing.
11.vid: /2/23/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 11 Version 6.360p.mp4

12.text: Dip a lint-free cloth or sponge in the solution of ammonia and vinegar.
12.vid: /0/06/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 12 Version 6.360p.mp4

13.vid: /c/c8/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 13 Version 6.360p.mp4

14.text: Toss the scrubbed clothing into the washing machine.

15.text: Turn the garment inside out - or at least the part where the stain is.
15.vid: /9/93/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 15 Version 6.360p.mp4

16.text: Mix one part liquid dish detergent with one part warm water.
16.vid: /d/d8/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 16 Version 6.360p.mp4

17.text: Dip a lint-free cleaning cloth or sponge into the solution.
17.vid: /b/b9/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 17 Version 6.360p.mp4

18.vid: /9/9a/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 18 Version 6.360p.mp4

20.text: Gently blot the stain with a cleaning rag or paper towel.
20.vid: /2/29/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 20 Version 6.360p.mp4

21.text: Spray the window cleaner or hairspray onto the cleaning cloth or sponge.
21.vid: /d/d8/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 21 Version 5.360p.mp4

22.text: Scrub the paint stain with a the moistened cloth.
22.vid: /e/eb/Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes Step 22 Version 6.360p.mp4
